EncryptionType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: KMS  
Update requires: No interruption

SseConfig.description: Server-side encryption (SSE) settings for a store.
SseConfig.markdownDescription:
Server-side encryption (SSE) settings for a store.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

.+.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

TagMap.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
A description for the store.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}||\p{M}||\p{Z}||\p{S}||\p{N}||\p{P}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the store.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 127  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}||\p{M}||\p{Z}||\p{S}||\p{N}||\p{P}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.markdownDescription:
The store's ARN.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 127  
Pattern: ^arn:.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.markdownDescription:
When the store was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ReferenceStoreId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: ^[0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
